duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide expert legal counsel on a range of activities covering the promotion, distribution, support, and sale of innovative medicines.
Serve as a brand/asset lawyer, advising on both promotional and non-promotional initiatives across a highly matrixed organization.
Advise on a wide-range of US commercial programs, with a strong knowledge of relevant fraud and abuse laws and regulations.
Counsel on the external legal environment relating to operating a dynamic biopharmaceutical organization, with a clear understanding of industry practices.
Engage with cross-functional teams and matrix partners to drive agendas and effectively communicate complex information in clear and concise terms.
Partner with the Compliance function to ensure policies and standard operating procedures are fit-for purpose, with clear organizational understanding.
Manage outside counsel in limited circumstances.
Effectively counsel the US pharmaceutical business to support successful performance by driving strategic initiatives and ensuring compliance with the US legal framework.

education_certification.credential: Current member (in good standing) of a state bar
